#summary Frequently Asked Questions, and there answers.

= Introduction =

Moojelly is still in beta, so there is no documentation, so you probably have questions.


*FAQ:*

Q: Where do I get a serial code for moojelly?

A: only from smellymoo, the developer. (its a gmail address, no prize for guessing it)

Q: Why if its free are there serial codes?

A: to make you give me a valid email address so I can contact you for your patches, so I can compile them into my complete patch.
